keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.
unmap ?
unmap /
unmap `

unmap H
unmap J
unmap K
unmap L

unmap r
map R reload

# Pinning
unmap <a-p>
map gp togglePinTab

map J nextTab
map K previousTab

map H goBack
map L goForward

map ' Marks.activateGotoMode

map ` showHelp
map ? enterFindMode
map : enterFindMode

map <c-o> goBack
# this is a capital i not a lowercase L
map <c-i> goForward

map <c-d> scrollPageDown
map <c-u> scrollPageUp
